entities.label: Case 0276/04 - Alleged Irregularities in Pristina Airport Contracts
United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo (UNMIK)
Divisional Manager of Airports Sector KTA

edges.label: 1. Audit Conducted
edges.tooltip: Chartered Accountants conducted an audit at Pristina International Airport, uncovering potential irregularities.

edges.label: 2. Audit Triggered Investigation
edges.tooltip: The audit findings led to the initiation of an investigation (Case 0276/04).

edges.label: 3. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: UNMIK conducted the investigation into the alleged irregularities.

edges.label: 4. Oversight Authority
edges.tooltip: UNMIK was responsible for overseeing compliance at Pristina International Airport.

edges.label: 5. Allegations Against
edges.tooltip: The Divisional Manager was implicated in unauthorized contract authorizations.

edges.label: 6. Violation Found
edges.tooltip: The investigation found violations of the UNMIK Finance Administrative Instruction 1999/2.

edges.label: 7. Administrative Transfer
edges.tooltip: Administration of Pristina International Airport was transferred to KTA and Pillar IV.

Divisional Manager: Authorized additional work orders without proper documentation.
Failed to secure funding approval prior to authorizing expenditure.

UNMIK Finance Administrative Instruction: Unauthorized expenditure exceeding €25,000 without proper authorization.
